data.title: Aggressive C Link Orb to Mid Window
data.description: Delay your throw a little later than your jump to successfully accomplish this aggressive orb lineup.

data.title: Start Round Garage Door One Way Poison Cloud
data.description: As soon as preparation phase is completed, throw your orb like so for an easy garage hold.

data.title: A Long One Way Poison Orb for A Site
data.description: Use this strong one way lineup to isolate A Long Attackers and A Short Attackers from executing easily.
